name: VIR-261.02 Verify that the proper subtotal is shown, that depends on

userStory.narrative:
As a customer on the site I would like to see a subtotal
of the order on the pdp as a combination/calculation
of the value tier and the delivery method cost.

title: VIR-261.02 Verify that the proper subtotal is shown, that depends on
description:
Examples:
|dependency|
|shopper zone|
|product price|
|shopper contract|
|delivery method|
|discounts defined to the selected contract|
